com.projector.management.server.database

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.projector.management.server.database.DataBase

  • public class DataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Because the database is not used in this project, so this class is used for storing the data in memory for test purpose only, instead of real database. We will implement the DAO in future.

        public static void addRservationInDB(Reservation reservation)
        Save the reservation to the database, that is, add the reservation to the hashmap in memory.
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation type, which contains reservation id, projector and reservation duration.

                            throws ReservationNotFoundException
        Delete the reservation which has the corresponding id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the reservation that needs to be deleted.
        Throws:
        ReservationNotFoundException - when there is no corresponding reservation exists

      • findReservationById

                                       throws ReservationNotFoundException
        find the reservation which has the corresponding id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the reservation
        Returns:
        A Reservation object which contains the reservation details.
        Throws:
        ReservationNotFoundException - when there is no corresponding reservation exists

      • checkProjectoravailability

        public static boolean checkProjectoravailability(Projector projector,
                                                 Duration duration)
        Check if the projector is available during the duration
        Parameters:
        projector - Projector object which contains the projector name and id.
        duration - a Duration object which contains the start time and the end time.
        Returns:
        true if projector can be reserved during the time period.

      • findAvailableDurationForProjector

        public static java.util.List<Duration> findAvailableDurationForProjector(Projector projector,
                                                                         java.util.Date startTime,
                                                                         java.util.Date endTime)
        Return the available durations between the startTime and the endTime. So user can make reservation between these durations.
        Parameters:
        projector - Projector object which contains the projector name and id.
        startTime - Date object
        endTime - Date object
        Returns:
        A list of Duration objects.
